column4: at 4:10 pm at Prek Samrong Bridge
column7: a father with his child was stopped from jumping.------ ------ Heng Samnang
column8: a 44 year old moto-dop from Chbar Ampov
column9: Phnom Penh. ------and his 3 year old daughter Sek Chhang stopped on the bridge on a black Dream motorcycle.------Traffic police from Takhmao intervened when the man started acting strangely and took the pair to the police station.------The cops said the man was suffering from a family crisis. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/448908
